#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
int main()
{
	int t,i;
	cin>>t;
	for(i=1;i<=t;i++)
	{
		char ch[100001];
		ll k,n,j,temp=-1,count;
		scanf("%s",ch);
		n=strlen(ch);
		for(j=1;j<n;j++)
		{
			k=0;
			count=0;
			while(j!=n)
			{
				if(ch[k]==ch[j])
				{
				k++;
				j++;
				count++;
				if(j==n)
				if(count>temp)
				temp=count;
			    }
			    else
			    break;
			}
		}
	    
	    cout<<"Case"<<" "<<i<<":"<<" "<<temp<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
